subject: Re: [junit] Looking for some "Best Practices"
msgSnippet: ** Reply to message from Vikas Malla  on Sun, 24 Nov 2002 01:36:24 +0000 (GMT) ... It s not overhead, it is an educational/design
messageBody:
** Reply to message from Vikas Malla <malla6um@...> on Sun, 24 Nov 2002
01:36:24 +0000 (GMT)

> This discussion has been exactly what I have been looking for a while.
> Continuing this further, I woud like to bring the question of development
> overheads involved.
> 1) What efforts have you guys taken in your respective organizations to reduce
> the programming overhead associated with writing unit tests?

It's not overhead, it is an educational/design activity.
